items.question: Where do Codex cloud tasks run?
choices: On a GitHub Actions runner only
items.explain: Codex provisions a sandboxed container per task.

items.question: What is a good way to run tasks concurrently?
choices: Start a new cloud task explicitly
Wait for one task to finish
Use a single long task only
items.explain: Start separate cloud tasks to parallelize.

items.question: A pull request primarily enables what?
items.explain: PRs propose changes and enable review before merge.

items.question: Compiler vs runtime: which runs the program?
items.explain: The runtime executes compiled or interpreted code.

items.question: HTTP GET is best used for:
items.explain: GET is safe and idempotent for retrieval.
